message.body: @erkan, when you say “stuff”, do you mean “stuff about zeronet”?
I was just wondering because all your other Zero${SOMETHING}.bit domains seem to be about ZeroNet. ;)

However, “Amazon To Reinstate Encryption Feature For Kindle Fire Tablet Following Public Scrutiny“ ⌘ http://www.ibtimes.com/amazon-reinstate-encryption-feature-kindle-fire-tablet-following-public-scrutiny-2330819
@erkan did you put the “0net://” there or is it converted automagically?
